short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Snake as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.ca,he,hi,lt,ms,no,sl,tr: ¡Juega a Snake como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.da: Spill Snake som en Chrome-utvidelse - Prøv det nå!
short.es: Juega a Snake como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi kroomi laiendusena ussi - proovi kohe järgi!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Snake bilang isang Chrome extension - Subukan mo na!
short.fr: Jouez au Snake en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez dès maintenant !
short.id: Jouez à Snake en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant!
short.it: Gioca a Snake come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてSnakeをプレイ - 今すぐ試してみてください！
short.lv: Spēlējiet Snake kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Izvēlējieties tagad!
short.nl: Speel Snake als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu!
short.ro: Joacă Snake ca o extensie Chrome - Încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Змейку как расширение для Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sv: Spela Snake som en Chrome-tillägg - Prova det nu!
short.th: เล่นเกมส์งูผ่าน Chrome extension - ลองเลย!
short.uk: Jouez à Snake en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez-le maintenant !
short.vi: Chơi trò Rắn săn mồi trên Chrome là một tiện ích mở rộng - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在 Chrome 扩展程序中玩贪吃蛇 - 立即体验！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中玩貪食蛇-立即試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Embark on a nostalgic journey with our HTML5 Snake Game Chrome Extension! Relive the classic gaming experience right in your browser with this entertaining and addictive extension.

Key Features:

Timeless Gameplay: Enjoy the thrill of the Snake game, a classic that has stood the test of time. Maneuver your serpent to collect points while avoiding collisions with walls and your own tail.

Sleek and Intuitive Design: Our extension comes with a minimalist and intuitive design, making it easy for users of all ages to jump in and start playing immediately.

Customizable Settings: Tailor the game to your preferences with adjustable settings. Modify the game speed, grid size, and other parameters to create a gaming experience that suits your style.

Leaderboards and Achievements: Compete with friends or challenge yourself to climb the leaderboards. Earn achievements for your gaming prowess and showcase your skills to the world.

Responsive Controls: Navigate your serpent with precision using responsive controls. Whether you're using a mouse or keyboard, the controls are designed for seamless and enjoyable gameplay.

Play Anywhere, Anytime: Break away from the monotony with a quick game session wherever you are. This Chrome extension ensures you can enjoy the Snake game on the go, turning your browser into a gaming hub.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
